title: Treason pretended against the King of Scots by certaine lordes and gentlemen, whose names hereafter followe. With a declaration of the Kinges Maiesties intention to his last acts of Parliament: which openeth fully in effect of all the saide conspiracy. Out of Skottish into English.
author: Studley, Christopher.
publicationStmtPublisher: For Thomas Nelson, and are to be solde at the West ende of Paules,
